question: do the advantages of supermarkets outweigh the disadvantages?
text: There has been a rapid growth in the building of vast supermarkets in the past decades. So,arguing over the pros and cons  of those places to shop is continuing.I believe, benefits of such malls outweigh drawbacks, and in this essay I will explain why.

To begin with,the greatest disadvantage is that you often need a car to get to the shopping mall.Mainly, all of those superstores are located out of the town,which made them more difficult to arrive and  to leave.To illustrate this,If you do not have a personal vehicle,you will have to wait for public transport with all of your grocery bags.Hence, it is hard to go shopping without having an auto.

Secondly,queues at the cash desk are an essential part of supermarkets. The reason for that is people always purchase large amounts of commodities  there.Thus,there are a higher number of full trolleys, which lead to slowing down the process at the checkout. Consequently, queueing would become time-consuming  at the cash till.

Conversely, a number of  advantages can be  clearly seen as a variety of goods that large malls offer.Obviously, they provide all kinds of needs, starting with foodstuff and ending up with clothes or even home textiles. For example, people do not have to search through different small shops to find things they need.  Thus, it is more convenient for consumers to buy everything under one umbrella.

The another beneficial side of supermarkets  is gastronomies.They are arranged inside of the construction, so it is easy to take away fresh meals from there. For example, my family and I went to the local mall last week. We all got tired during the shopping, as we walked around for a long time. At this point,we went to the delicateessen shop, which has been located on the north of mall,and bought main course, so we did not have to cook at home after tough shopping. Therefore,cookeries can be really valuable, because of  the availability of freshly cooked food.

To sum up, superstores  have a wide selection of products, which is very comfortable for individuals, as it saves time while shopping. Also, gastronomies  always provide recent prepared meal, so people can take with themselves.It can be noted several drawbacks, however, benefits are overbalance them.

error_list.error_des: It seems that there is an article usage problem here.
It appears that you are missing a comma after the introductory phrase in this essay. Consider adding a comma.
It is unlikely that your sentence needs the article The before another. Consider deleting the article.
The word delicateessen is not in our dictionary. If you’re sure this spelling is correct, you can add it to your personal dictionary to prevent future alerts.
The noun phrase mall seems to be missing a determiner before it. Consider adding an article.
It appears that the phrase main course does not contain the correct article usage. Consider making a change.
The noun phrase recent prepared meal seems to be missing a determiner before it. Consider adding an article.
The adjective recent is modifying prepared instead of a noun or pronoun. Use an adverb to modify a verb, adjective, or other adverb.
It seems that meal may not agree in number with other words in this phrase.
It seems that there is a pronoun problem here.
It appears that the form of the verb overbalance does not work with are in this sentence.
